page.title: 05ECOLOGY - OUR SCHOOL FIELD
page.content: On Monday June 24th we went for a walk in our school field. We saw the herb garden; we saw mint, chives, thyme and sage. We saw some toadstools growing in the field and some buttercups and daisies. In the vegetable patch, carrots, runner beans, radish and tomatoes were growing. We went to a tree and put some white paper under it and shook the tree and some leaves fell down. We looked up and saw a tiny spider spinning a web. On Friday we found a toad on the rockery. Today we looked for the toad but could not find him, he had gone away. We saw poppies and buttercups growing in the rockery. In the next field we saw a brown pony and a baby foal. The foal neighed because he was frightened of us. In another field we could see some sheep.
